body: I was thinking of finally releasing my texture pack but I cant figure out medafire or dropbox.  Any help?
body_tagged: I was thinking of finally releasing my texture pack but I cant figure out medafire or dropbox.  Any help?
title: Help with downloads

replies.body: Make a Mediafire account, then drag the file into the window to upload. After that, copy the file link.
replies.body_tagged: Make a Mediafire account, then drag the file into the window to upload. After that, copy the file link.

replies.body: I think you can also select it directly from the folder (that's what I do).
replies.body_tagged: I think you can also select it directly from the folder (that's what I do).
